feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove db calls in favour of the sdk usage by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16078
  • Parallelise processAIColumn calls by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16077
  • Ensure primary display column is always required by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16062
  • Don't clear user prompt if the user rejects a suggestion by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16085
  • Instrument table sdk by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16088

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.0...3.10.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Icon picker to ts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16092
  • Potential fix for user screen not loading in certain situations by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16093

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.1...3.10.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove tours by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15999
  • Graceful termination of the worker/app servers by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16083
  • Convert "create screen frontend" to TS by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16071
  • Account for null roles object in app access check by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16096
  • Extract new pill component by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16097

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.2...3.10.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add step sidebar in Automations by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16087
  • Improve error message while publishing an app with wrong cron settings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16104

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.3...3.10.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix some issues with new automation step panel by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.4...3.10.5
